channel.title: Gather on bad to the code
channel.description: Recent content in Gather on bad to the code

item.title: I second that emotion
item.description: In an earlier post we scraped the pictures of parliamentarians and used Recognition to analyses their faces. It’s time to look a little bit closer at the data, test the usage of the ‘gather’ and ‘spread’ function and get to know ggplot a little bit more. library("tidyverse") library("magick") library("ggthemes") library("extrafont") Here are the different features we now have available. On the side of the observations (rows), it might be best to take a snapshot (at the end of the legislation) in order to have a slightly more objective representation.
